entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced by his twin brothers Fred and George Weasley. He has a lightning scar on his forehead.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as Harry's brother. He is curious about Harry's lightning scar.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twin brothers who introduces himself and his brother George to Harry.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the twin brothers who introduces himself and his brother Fred to Harry.

relationships.description: Ron is introduced as Harry's brother.
Fred and George are twin brothers who introduce themselves to Harry.
Ron finds Harry interesting and they seem to be getting along well.
